silver.name: Team Building
silver.desc:
Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator. Gain another after 5 player combats.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

silver.desc: Your next augment is one tier higher.

silver.name: Band of Thieves
silver.desc: Gain 1 Thief's Gloves.

silver.desc:
Gain a random 2-cost champion now. Gain the same one again every time you level up.

silver.desc: Allies isolated in pairs gain 10% Attack Speed and 10 Armor at the start of combat.

silver.name: Big Friend I
silver.desc: Allies that start combat next to an ally with over 1750 Health gain 10% Durability.

silver.name: Lunch Money
silver.desc:
Every 7 damage you deal to enemy tacticians gives you 2 gold.

silver.desc: Gain a random Emblem.

silver.name: Branching Out+
silver.desc:

silver.name: Called Shot
silver.desc: Set your win streak to 4. Gain 4 gold.

silver.name: Celestial Blessing I
silver.desc: Your team gains 12% Omnivamp. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 200 Health.

silver.name: Chaotic Evolution
silver.desc: Starring up a champion grants them one of the following: 100 Health, 6% Durability, 10% Ability Power, 10% Attack Damage, 10% Attack Speed. Bonuses stack.

silver.name: Rolling For Days I
silver.desc: Gain 10 free Shop rerolls.

silver.name: Corrosion
silver.desc: Enemy champions in the first two rows lose 4 Armor and Magic Resist every 2 seconds.

silver.name: Crafted Crafting
silver.desc: Whenever you craft a completed item, gain 2 rerolls.

silver.name: Component Buffet
silver.desc:
Whenever you would get a component, gain a component anvil instead. Gain a random component now.

The anvil offers 4 choices.

silver.name: Exiles I
silver.desc: Your champions that start combat with no adjacent champions gain a 20% max Health shield for 10 seconds.

silver.name: Stand United
silver.desc:
Gain 1.5% Attack Damage and 1.5% Ability Power for each non-unique Trait active across your team.

Current Bonus: ?% %i:scaleAD% ?% %i:scaleAP%

silver.name: Spoils of War I
silver.desc: Enemies have a 25% chance to drop loot when killed.

silver.name: Dummify
silver.desc: Lose all champions on your board and bench. Gain a Training Dummy with 80% of their combined health. The dummy gains 1200 Health per stage.

silver.name: Efficient Shopper
silver.desc: For the next 4 carousels, gain a second copy of the champion taken.

silver.name: Eye For An Eye
silver.desc:
For every 15 ally champions that die, gain a random component (max 3).

Deaths Remaining: ?

silver.name: Eye For An Eye+
silver.desc:
Gain a random component. For every 18 ally champions that die, gain another component (max 2).

silver.name: Find Your Center
silver.desc: Your champion that starts combat in the center of the front row gains 15% Damage Amp and 15% max Health.

silver.name: Firesale
silver.desc: Each round, steal a random 3-cost or lower champion from the shop. Gain 1 gold.

silver.name: Glass Cannon I
silver.desc: Allies that start combat in the back row begin combat at 80% Health but gain 17% Damage Amp.

silver.name: Good For Something I
silver.desc: Champions that aren't holding items have a 50% chance to drop 1 gold on death.

silver.name: Delayed Start
silver.desc: Sell your board and bench. Gain 4 random 2-star 1-cost champions. Disable your Shop for the next 3 rounds.

silver.name: Healing Orbs I
silver.desc: When an enemy dies, the nearest ally is healed for 220.

silver.name: Iron Assets
silver.desc: Gain a component anvil and 3 gold.

silver.desc: Gain 1 random completed item.

silver.name: Late Game Specialist
silver.desc: When you reach Level 9, gain 36 gold.

silver.name: Lineup
silver.desc: Your team gains 2 Armor and Magic Resist for each ally that starts combat in the front two rows.

silver.name: Latent Forge
silver.desc:
After 8 player combats, gain an Artifact anvil.

The anvil offers 4 choices. Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

silver.name: Makeshift Armor I
silver.desc: Allies without items equipped gain 30 Armor and Magic Resist.

silver.name: Missed Connections
silver.desc: Gain a copy of each 1-cost champion.

silver.name: On a Roll
silver.desc: Whenever you star up a champion that you fielded last combat, gain 2 free Shop rerolls. Gain 2 gold.

silver.name: One, Two, Five!
silver.desc: Gain 1 random component, 2 gold, and 1 random 5-cost champion.

silver.name: One Twos Three
silver.desc: Gain 1 1-cost champion, 2 2-cost champions, and 1 3-cost champion.

silver.name: Pandora's Items
silver.desc:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain 1 random component.

silver.name: Patience is a Virtue
silver.desc: Each round, gain 2 free rerolls if you did not buy a champion last round.

silver.name: Placebo
silver.desc: Your team gains 1% Attack Speed. Gain 8 gold.

silver.name: Placebo+
silver.desc: Your team gains 1% Attack Speed. Gain 14 gold.

silver.name: Preparation I
silver.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 30 Health, 3% Attack Damage, and 3% Ability Power every round. Champions start with 1 stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

silver.name: Recombobulator
silver.desc: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions 1 cost tier higher (max 5). Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

silver.name: Restart Mission
silver.desc: Remove all champions on your board and bench. Gain 2 random 2-star 3-costs, 3 2-star 2-costs, and 1 2-star 1-cost champion.

silver.name: Risky Moves
silver.desc: Your Tactician loses 20 Health, but after 7 player combats, gain 30 gold.

silver.desc: After 10 seconds of combat, your team heals 40% of their missing Health.

silver.name: Silver Destiny
silver.desc: Gain a random Silver Augment and 2 gold.

silver.desc: Gain a random Silver Augment and 4 gold.

silver.name: Silver Spoon
silver.desc: Gain 10 XP.

silver.name: Slice of Life
silver.desc: Twice per stage, gain a random champion. Its cost increases by Stage. This effect ends after receiving 1 5-cost champion.

silver.name: Survivor
silver.desc: Gain 4 gold. After 3 players are eliminated, gain 100 more gold.

silver.name: Table Scraps
silver.desc: After the next 2 carousels, gain one champion that was not taken and its item. Gain 1 gold.

silver.desc: Gain 1 random component and 2 random 3-cost champions.

silver.desc: Increase your current and max player Health by 25. On carousel rounds you are released earlier, but are much slower.

silver.desc: Gain an Air Hex. Champions within gain 25% Attack Speed and their damage 30% Sunders enemies for 5 seconds.

silver.desc: Gain a Rumble. Your strongest Rumble gains +7 Range and constantly fires missiles at enemies, increased with Attack Speed.

silver.desc: Your team gains 30 Health for each ally that starts combat in the front row.

silver.desc: Your team gains 5% Attack Damage. Every 5 seconds, they gain 5% more.

silver.desc: Gain a Water Hex. Champions within gain 3 Mana Regen. Their damage 30% Shreds enemies for 5 seconds.

Roll 3 dice. Gain rewards based on their total.

gold.desc: Gain a Tear of the Goddess. Your team gains 1 Mana Regen. After 12 seconds in combat, increase this to 3.

gold.desc: Your champions that start combat with no adjacent champions gain a 30% max Health shield for 10 seconds.

gold.desc: Enemies have a 30% chance to drop loot when killed.

gold.desc:
You cannot choose your Carousel rewards. Gain an additional 6 player Health and 10 Gold each carousel round.

gold.desc: When an enemy dies, the nearest ally is healed for 440.

gold.desc: Gain a Crown of Demacia, which provides significant bonuses to the wearer. If the holder dies, lose the round.

Your team gains 9 Health and size for each time you've rolled this game.

gold.name: High Voltage
gold.desc: Gain an Ionic Spark. Your Ionic Sparks have +3 hex radius and do 20% more damage.

gold.name: Hustler
gold.desc:
You no longer gain interest but gain 3 gold at the start of every player combat round. Gain 6 gold now.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

gold.name: Jeweled Lotus I
gold.desc: Your team gains 20% Critical Strike Chance, and their Abilities can critically strike.

gold.name: Know Your Enemy
gold.desc: You can see who you will fight next. Your team gains 8% Damage Amp, increased to 15% if you and your opponent have any of the same traits active.

gold.name: Last Second Save
gold.desc: The first time each ally falls below 35% Health, they restore 20% maximum Health.

gold.name: Patient Study
gold.desc: After player combat, gain 2 XP if you won or 3 XP if you lost.

gold.name: Little Buddies
gold.desc: Your 4-cost and 5-cost champions gain 55 Health and 6% Attack Speed for every 1-cost and 2-cost champion on your board.

gold.name: Mace's Will
gold.desc: Gain a Sparring Gloves. Your team gains 8% Attack Speed and 20% Critical Strike Chance.

gold.name: Makeshift Armor II
gold.desc: Allies without items equipped gain 45 Armor and Magic Resist.

gold.name: Malicious Monetization
gold.desc: Gain 2 gold. For the next 3 rounds, enemy champions drop 2 gold when killed.

gold.name: Mess Hall
gold.desc: After 10 seconds of combat, your champions gain 8% Attack Speed and attacks also hurl 2 delicious projectiles that deal 25(%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.

gold.name: NO SCOUT NO PIVOT
gold.desc: Champions that fight in player combat cannot be benched or sold. Your team gains 1% Health, and 1.5% Attack Damage and Ability Power after player combat.

gold.name: Pair of Fours
gold.desc: If your team has exactly 2 4-cost champions, they each gain 504 Health and 28.4% Attack Speed. Gain a random 4-cost.

gold.name: Pandora's Bench
gold.desc: At the start of every round, champions on the 3 rightmost bench slots transform into random champions of the same cost. Gain 6 gold.

gold.name: Pandora's Items II
gold.desc:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain 2 random components.

gold.name: Pilfer
gold.desc: Each round, gain a 1-star copy of the first champion you killed last combat. The first time you gain 35 gold worth of champions in this way, gain a Thief's Gloves.

gold.name: Plot Armor
gold.desc: Your team gains 8 Armor and Magic Resist. After falling below 50% Health, increase this to 40 for the rest of combat.

gold.name: Portable Forge
gold.desc:
Choose 1 of 4 Artifacts.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

gold.name: Preparation II
gold.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 50 Health, 4% Attack Damage, and 4% Ability Power every round. Champions start with 1 stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

gold.name: Prizefighter
gold.desc: Gain 2 item components. Every 5 wins gives you an item component.

gold.name: Pyromaniac
gold.desc: Gain a Red Buff. Your Burns deal 50% increased damage.

gold.name: Raining Gold
gold.desc: Gain 7 gold now and 1 gold every round.

gold.name: ReinFOURcement
gold.desc: The next 4-cost champion you buy with gold is instantly upgraded to 2-star. Gain 5 gold.

gold.name: Replication
gold.desc: Choose 1 of 3 components. For the next 2 rounds, gain a copy of that component.

gold.name: Salvage Bin
gold.desc: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 8 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's items and Emblems).

gold.name: Salvage Bin+
gold.desc: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 4 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's items and Emblems).

gold.name: Slammin'
gold.desc: Gain 1 random component(s). After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than consumables), gain 2 XP.

gold.name: Slammin'+
gold.desc: Gain 1 random component(s) and 10 XP now. After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than consumables), gain 2 XP.

gold.name: Solo Leveling
gold.desc: For the next 5 combats, your team size is 1 but the champion you field has massively increased stats. Gain 1 XP for every kill they get. Afterwards, gain 2 item components.

gold.name: Spear's Will
gold.desc: Your team gains 12% Attack Damage and 5 Mana. Gain a B.F. Sword.

gold.name: Spirit Link
gold.desc: Champions restore 5% of their max Health every 4 seconds. Increase the healing by 0.5% for every 10 missing player Health.

gold.name: Stars Are Born
gold.desc: The first 1-cost and 2-cost champions you buy are instantly upgraded to 2-star. Gain 7 gold.

gold.name: Thorn-Plated Armor
gold.desc: Gain a Bramble Vest. Your Bramble Vests deal 20-170% more damage (based on Stage).

gold.name: Tons of Stats!
gold.desc: Your team gains 44 Health, 4% Attack Damage, 4% Ability Power, 4 Armor, 4 Magic Resist, 4% Attack Speed, and 4 Mana.

gold.name: Trade Sector
gold.desc: Gain a free Shop reroll every round. Gain 4 gold.

gold.name: Treasure Hunt
gold.desc: Gain a locked chest each Stage between now and Stage 6. Unlock each chest when you spend 20 gold on Shop rerolls. These chests persist until opened.

gold.name: Trifecta I
gold.desc:
Gain 2 3-cost champions.
Combat Start: 3 random 3-cost champions gain 220 Health and 20% Attack Speed.

gold.name: Double Trouble
gold.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 30% Attack Damage and 30% Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

gold.name: Two Much Value
gold.desc: Gain 1 reroll for every 2 unique 2-cost champions fielded last player combat. Gain 2 2-cost champions.

gold.name: Two Trick
gold.desc: Gain a random 2-star 2-cost and 2 random 2-star 1-cost champions.

gold.name: Warpath
gold.desc:
Gain a 2-star 2-cost champion. After dealing 80 player damage, gain a chest of high cost champions and items.

gold.desc:
Gain a random 1-cost champion. Gain another copy of them at the start of each round for the rest of the game.

gold.desc: Gain 3 random 2-star 3-cost champions and 3 gold.

gold.desc: Gain 20 Gold. Your next augment is one tier lower.

gold.name: Advanced Loan+
gold.desc: Gain 33 Gold. Your next augment is one tier lower.

gold.name: Arcane Viktor-y
gold.desc:
After 8 seconds of combat, stun the enemy team for 1.5 seconds. Repeat this after 20 seconds of combat.

gold.desc: Gain 2 Xin Zhao. Your strongest Xin Zhao constantly strikes nearby enemies and executes enemies. After 5 player combats as a 3-star, unlock Zaahen. He replaces Xin Zhao and takes his items.

gold.name: Unsealed From Steel
gold.desc: Choose 1 of 4 Darkin Weapons. Darkin Weapons are Artifacts that grant the Darkin trait.

gold.name: Urf's Gambit
gold.desc: If you win your next player combat, gain a Spatula. If you lose, gain a Frying Pan. Gain a component anvil and 6 gold now.

gold.name: Warlord's Honor
gold.desc: Every round, your team gain 5% Attack Damage and Ability Power, stacking up to 4 times.

gold.name: Walk The True Path I
gold.desc: Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator, a Shen, a Jhin, and 6 gold. Ionia 10 gains a Prismatic upgrade.

gold.name: Wild Growth
gold.desc: 3-star Yordles become massive, moving slower but gaining 15% Health and 35% Attack Damage and Ability Power. Gain a Rumble and Lulu.

gold.name: Woven Magic
gold.desc:
Gain a random item component. Every 2200 Mana your team spends grants an additional component (max ?/3).

Mana spent: ?/2200

gold.name: Construct a Companion
gold.desc: The next 1-cost champion you buy is 3 star. Gain 2 gold.

gold.name: Demacia Forever
gold.desc: Demacians gain 3 permanent Health every time they rally. They also gain 1.5% permanent Attack Damage and Ability Power every 3 rallies. Gain a Jarvan IV, a Sona, and a Xin Zhao.

gold.name: Ixtal Expeditionist
gold.desc: Gain a Qiyana, a Neeko, and a Milio. Increase your current and max player Health by 10.

gold.name: Cosmic Calling
gold.desc: Gain a Spear of Shojin and a Leona. On Stage 3-7, gain a Taric.

gold.name: Gilded Steel
gold.desc:
Gain 3 non-Tank 5-cost champions. If you field a 5-cost champion, your 1 to 4-cost champions gain 8% Durability.

K.O. Coliseum Championship, 2025

prismatic.name: Band of Thieves II
prismatic.desc: Gain 2 Thief's Gloves. After 8 player combats, gain another.

prismatic.name: Belt Overflow
prismatic.desc: Gain 4 Giant's Belts. Your Giant's Belts grant +85 bonus Health.

prismatic.name: Binary Airdrop
prismatic.desc: Combat start: Champions holding 2 items gain a random 3rd completed item. Gain 2 random component now.

prismatic.name: Birthday Present
prismatic.desc: Gain a 2-star champion and 1 gold every time you level up. The champion's cost tier is your level minus 4 (max: 5-cost).

prismatic.name: Bronze For Life II
prismatic.desc:
Your team gains 2.5% Damage Amp and 4 Armor and Magic Resist for each Bronze-tier trait.

Damage Amp: ?%
Armor and Magic Resist: ?

prismatic.name: Buried Treasures
prismatic.desc: Gain a random item component now and at the start of the next 5 rounds.

prismatic.name: Call to Chaos
prismatic.desc:
Gain a powerful and random reward.

Reward: ???

prismatic.name: Celestial Blessing III
prismatic.desc: Your team gains 25% Omnivamp. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 1000 Health.

prismatic.name: Coronation
prismatic.desc: Gain a Tactician's Crown. Tactician's Crown, Shield, and Cape grant the holder an additional 20% Attack Speed, 25% Attack Damage, and 30% Ability Power.

prismatic.name: Cursed Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain +2 max team size and your team gains 4% Durability, but you take double player damage when you lose a player combat.

prismatic.name: Deadlier Blades
prismatic.desc: Gain a Deathblade. Deathblades permanently gain 1% Attack Damage whenever their holders score a takedown.

prismatic.name: Deadlier Caps
prismatic.desc: Gain a Rabadon's Deathcap. Rabadon's Deathcaps permanently gain 1% Ability Power whenever their holders score a takedown.

prismatic.name: Spoils of War III
prismatic.desc: Enemies have a 45% chance to drop loot when killed.

prismatic.name: Expected Unexpectedness
prismatic.desc: Now and at the start of the next 2 stages, roll 3 dice. Gain various rewards based on their total.

prismatic.name: Flexible
prismatic.desc: Gain 1 random Emblem. At the start of every Stage, gain a random Emblem. Your team gains 40 Health for each Emblem they are holding.

prismatic.name: Prismatic Ticket
prismatic.desc: Each time your Shop is rerolled, you have a 50% chance to gain a free reroll.

prismatic.name: Giant and Mighty
prismatic.desc: Your team becomes large, gaining 200 Health and 10% max Health.

prismatic.name: Going Long
prismatic.desc:
You no longer gain interest. Gain 15 gold now. Round start: gain 4 XP.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

prismatic.name: Jeweled Lotus II
prismatic.desc: Your team gains 25% Critical Strike Chance and 10% Critical Strike Damage, and their Abilities can critically strike.

prismatic.name: Hard Commit
prismatic.desc: Gain a random Emblem. Now and at the start of each Stage, gain a 1-star champion of that trait with a cost equal to the Stage (max 5) and 7 gold.

prismatic.name: Hedge Fund
prismatic.desc:
Gain 25 gold. Your max interest is increased to 10.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

prismatic.name: Shopping Spree
prismatic.desc: When you level up, gain a number of free shop refreshes equal to your level+1. Gain 2 gold.

prismatic.name: Hold the Line
prismatic.desc: Allies in your back 2 rows gain 10% Ability Power and 9% Attack Damage for each ally that starts combat in your front row.

prismatic.name: Invested+
prismatic.desc: Gain 26 gold. After every combat, gain 1 Shop reroll for every 10 gold above 50 (max 80 gold).

prismatic.name: Invested++
prismatic.desc: Gain 40 gold. After every combat, gain 1 Shop reroll for every 10 gold above 50 (max 80 gold).

prismatic.name: Living Forge
prismatic.desc:
Gain an Artifact anvil now and after every 9 player combats.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

prismatic.name: Lucky Gloves
prismatic.desc: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 2 Sparring Gloves.

prismatic.name: Lucky Gloves+
prismatic.desc: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 2 Sparring Gloves now, then another after 4 player combats.

prismatic.name: Level Up!
prismatic.desc: When you buy XP, gain an additional 2. Gain 12 immediately.

prismatic.name: Nine Lives
prismatic.desc: Set your current and max player Health to 9. On combat loss, you only lose 1 health and gain loot. You can't gain health.

prismatic.name: One Buff, Two Buff
prismatic.desc: Gain a Red Buff, a Blue Buff, and a Champion Duplicator.

prismatic.name: Pandora's Items III
prismatic.desc:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain 1 random Radiant item.

prismatic.name: Prismatic Destiny
prismatic.desc: Gain a random Prismatic Augment and 4 gold.

prismatic.name: Radiant Relics
prismatic.desc:
Choose 1 of 5 Radiant items. Gain a Magnetic Remover.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.

prismatic.name: Radiant Rascal
prismatic.desc:
Gain a Rascal's Gloves item. This equips 2 random Radiant items every round.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.

prismatic.name: Shimmerscale Essence
prismatic.desc:
Gain a Mogul's Mail. In 5 rounds, gain a Gamblers Blade.

These items give gold as well as combat power.

prismatic.name: Starter Kit
prismatic.desc:
Gain a 4-cost champion, a 2-star 1-cost champion that shares a trait with them, and 8 gold.

At the start of the next 2 stages, gain that 4-cost champion again.

prismatic.name: Sword Overflow
prismatic.desc: Gain 4 B.F. Swords. Your B.F. Swords grant +5% Attack Speed.

prismatic.name: Tactician's Kitchen
prismatic.desc: Gain a random Emblem. After 6 rounds, gain a Tactician's Cape.

prismatic.name: The Golden Egg
prismatic.desc: Gain a golden egg that hatches in 11 turns for a huge amount of loot. Winning player combat speeds up the hatch timer by an extra turn.

prismatic.name: Tiniest Titan
prismatic.desc: Gain 2 player Health and 2 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster. Gain 15 gold now.

prismatic.name: Tiny, but Deadly
prismatic.desc: Your team becomes small, gaining 30% Attack Speed and Movement Speed.

prismatic.name: Trifecta II
prismatic.desc:
Gain 3 3-cost champions. Allies gain 5% Attack Speed.
Combat Start: 3 random 3-cost champions gain 300 Health and 25% Attack Speed.

prismatic.name: Upward Mobility
prismatic.desc: Buying XP costs 1 less. Gain 2 Health and 2 free rerolls whenever you level up.

prismatic.name: Wand Overflow
prismatic.desc: Gain 4 Needlessly Large Rods. Your Needlessly Large Rods grant +5% Attack Speed.

prismatic.name: Worth the Wait II
prismatic.desc:
Gain 2 copies of a random 2-cost champion. Gain another copy of them at the start of each round for the rest of the game.

Champion: ???

prismatic.name: Secrets of the Sands
prismatic.desc: Gain 6 gold. Gain an Azir on Stage 3-5. Each time you unlock a Shuriman, gain an ideal item for them.

prismatic.name: Walk The True Path II
prismatic.desc: Gain 2 Lesser Champion Duplicators, a Jhin, a Shen, and an Infinity Edge. Ionia 10 gains a Prismatic upgrade.

prismatic.name: Soul Awakening
prismatic.desc: Combat start: Your team gains 2% Attack Damage and Ability Power per second for 10 seconds. At max stacks, deal 12% bonus true damage.

prismatic.name: Band of Thieves II+
prismatic.desc: Gain 2 Thief's Gloves. After 6 player combats, gain another.

prismatic.name: Band of Thieves II++
prismatic.desc: Gain 2 Thief's Gloves. After 3 player combats, gain another.

prismatic.name: Chosen Wolves
prismatic.desc: Gain an Ambessa and a Kindred. When Kindred casts, Ambessa always gains their protection against death and gains Attack Damage while protected. When Ambessa casts, Wolf strikes all enemies hit, dealing reduced damage.

prismatic.name: Comeback Story
prismatic.desc: Your team gains 5 Health and 0.4% Attack Speed per missing player Health.

prismatic.name: Commerce Core
prismatic.desc: Gain 16 free Shop rerolls now and 2 every round for the rest of the game.

prismatic.name: Component Heist
prismatic.desc: After 4 player combats, gain 1 of every item component.

prismatic.name: Dragonguards
prismatic.desc: Gain a Shyvana and a 2-star Jarvan IV. When Jarvan casts, Shyvana gains Shield. When Shyvana casts, Jarvan jumps in and deals damage based on his Armor and Magic Resist. After every player combat, gain a Jarvan IV.

prismatic.name: Forged in Strength
prismatic.desc:
Gain 1 random Artifact. When you drop below 35 Health, gain 3 more random Artifacts.

Remix Rumble Championship, 2023

prismatic.name: Growth Mindset
prismatic.desc: Gain 50 XP.

prismatic.name: Indecision II
prismatic.desc: In 3 rounds, choose a new augment of the same tier. Gain 8 gold now.

prismatic.name: Just Hit
prismatic.desc: Gain a Champion Duplicator, 18 Shop rerolls, and 10 gold.

prismatic.name: Luxury Subscription
prismatic.desc:
Gain a package containing a 5-cost champion, a 2-star 1-cost champion, and 5 gold.

At the start of the next 2 stages, gain the package again.

prismatic.name: Min-Max
prismatic.desc:
Gain a Golden Item Remover and 4 random components.

Golden Item Remover is a Magnetic Remover with infinite uses.

prismatic.name: Money Monsoon
prismatic.desc: Gain 7 gold now and every round for the rest of the game.

prismatic.name: Prismatic Destiny+
prismatic.desc: Gain a random Prismatic Augment and 10 gold.

prismatic.name: Retribution
prismatic.desc: Gain 2 Hands of Justice. Allies equipped with Hand of Justice can critically strike with their Abilities.

prismatic.name: Sweet Treats
prismatic.desc:
Gain an Artifact anvil. Your team gains 20 Health for each item equipped on champions.

Health Gained: ?

Magic N' Mayhem Tactician's Crown, 2024

prismatic.name: The Axiomata
prismatic.desc: Gain 3 random elemental hex augments. Future augment rounds instead grant you items and gold based on the augment's tier.

prismatic.name: The Trait Tree
prismatic.desc: Gain 3 random Emblems and 2 gold.

prismatic.name: The World Runes
prismatic.desc: Gain 2 Emblems from random Region traits. Gain 2 XP every player combat, increased to 4 XP if 4 or more Region traits are active.

prismatic.name: We Stick Together
prismatic.desc:
Gain a random Emblem and a completed item anvil. Allies that share a trait with that Emblem gain 20% Attack Speed. (Emblem Trait: )

Into The Arcane Tactician's Crown, 2025

prismatic.name: Win Out
prismatic.desc: When you reach level 9, immediately level to 10 and gain 2 free Shop rerolls. Gain 6 XP now.

prismatic.name: Bandle Bounty II
prismatic.desc: For every Yordle you've unlocked or unlock, gain 4 gold. The Bandle Paths reveal a secret Yordle 10! Gain a Tristana and Teemo.

prismatic.name: The Trait Tree+
prismatic.desc: Gain 3 random Emblems, a Reforger, and 4 gold.

prismatic.name: Trials of Twilight II
prismatic.desc:
Gain 2 Xin Zhaos and a Bloodthirster. Xin Zhao becomes an Attack Fighter. After 5 player combats as a 3-star, unlock Zaahen.

At the start of the next 3 stages, gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator.
